programme.title: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship from another world crashes in the rural Arizona desert. An amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Join Walter Lloyd on a trip across the cosmos from the night-side of Earth. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: When the sun goes down, Space Channel turns on as the Universe comes alive in a melodic mixtape curated for night owls. Duration: 14400

programme.title: AFTER DARK
programme.desc: If so, AFTER DARK is for you. Join Walter Lloyd on an intimate tour of the cosmos, right from your bed...at night. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Daybreak'ing News
programme.desc: With correspondents stationed around the world, Space Channel News covers every aspect of the space industry, from the latest mission, groundbreaking innovation, or a major news event. Duration: 3600

programme.title: New Space Revolution
programme.desc: Space Channel News brings an update on Venus clouds, laser communications, SpaceX SN10 landing crash and an interview with Robert Jacobson on his book "Space is Open for Business" Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: The implications of NASA dramatically raising its pricing to work with the ISS, China dn Russia enter into a new partnership and Space Hotels. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Best of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space Channel selects the our favorite Cinespace movies Duration: 7200

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: The stories we're covering today, that will affect our lives tomorrow. Deep Space Technologies, the SCOUT mission, Cosmic Shielding and more... Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Our Journey to Space
programme.desc: Sabree Edwards hosts from the Columbia Memorial Space Center in Downey, California. He takes us for an inside look at Virgin Galactic's facilities in New Mexico as well as what you can expect if you ride on Blue Origin or want to watch a launch in Florida. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel News Special
programme.desc: Space Channel covers the latest news, explores what is...Space For Humanity and more. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Social Space
programme.desc: Our Darth comedy episode where we finally found out why Yoda is such a good gardener. Jedi fruits grow best with a green thumb! Duration: 1800

programme.title: Cinespace Short Films
programme.desc: A short film competition that offers filmmakers, editors, and animators around the world a chance to share their works inspired by, and using actual NASA imagery. Duration: 1800

programme.desc: Our favorite space movies from the big screen to streaming, must see films for your inner space nerd. Duration: 3600
